contentList.content: *He snorts.* Unfortunately, the thought of hanging around on that stuffy island, with all that death underneath, did not appeal to me.
*You take a look at the trader's wares.*
It's a pleasure to meet you [LeaderLib_PlayerName_6c5b9559-53e3-47f7-8881-309a930e4be3]. You may call me [LeaderLib_SpeakerName_9fc648d4-7984-44e7-afa4-b8a07f21185b].
*Introduce yourself, then ask the man who he is.*
[USER] Don't teleport your avatar to the dialog event when dialog gets redirected.

A Story Compilation Error occurred with your active mods.
You may be missing mod requirements.
Mods will not work correctly.
To potentially fix this, please check the requirements of your active mods, such as required dependency mods, the script extender, and/or an updated game version.
Swap between the undead and non-undead equivalent of your current race.

A Story Compilation Error occurred with your active mods.
You may be missing mod requirements.
Mods will not work correctly.
To potentially fix this, please check the requirements of your active mods, such as required dependency mods, the script extender, and/or an updated game version.
Me? Oh, I'm nobody... Just an old bag of bones, keen on seeing the sights. I hear this cruise ship has a great buffet. *He snorts.*

If enabled, two-handed weapons can backstab.
(Default: Disabled)
Change your preset to [LeaderLib_PresetMenu_CurrentPreset_2e904bf9-1a93-447a-8f07-5383aea20068]? Your items, skills, and talents will be preserved.
[GLOBAL] Disable automatically pulling party members within 30m into combat. (Currently Enabled)
Have you been enjoying that book I gave you? *He rubs his beard.*
[HOST] Disable Balanced Experience for All Parties - Players in other parties will no longer be automatically leveled up to the highest player level. (Currently Enabled)
Characters that follow you with Chain All will no longer avoid surfaces.
*The old man moves quickly, and seems to be prepared in the blink of an eye.*
Timed autosaving will pause while in combat.
Unchain all chained characters under your control that are within [1].
[GLOBAL] Enable Friendly Fire. This setting is for mods that implement friendly fire in their skill targeting conditions. (Currently Disabled)

[LOAD] Load Global Settings - These are global extender mod settings LeaderLib manages.
Path: Documents/Larian Studios/Divinity Original Sin 2 Definitive Edition/Osiris Data/LeaderLib_GlobalSettings.json
When combat starts, LeaderLib will autosave the game.
[GLOBAL] Disable Dialog Redirection. Certain dialog events will start with the closest player character available. (Default)
Anyway, I figure I'll make this my little home away from home, and sell some old junk I've accumulated over the years.
Before I get set up... Here. I have a few extra copies of this book I bet you'd like. It's on the house.
*Lothar lets out a hearty laugh.* As it turns out, doing nothing but fishing all day is boring! I figure I'll see some interesting things if I tag along.
Ahah. A fan, eh? Here you go.
*The old man looks to you as you approach.* Oh good... Another surviver!
The time delay between autosaving, in minutes.
<font color='#FF0000'>LeaderLib Failed to Load Global Settings</font>
[Debug] Fix Dialog for Active LeaderLib Traders

LeaderLib
Open the mod menu to access registered settings menus.
*Ask why Lothar left his "vacation" on Reaper's Eye.*

The following required mods are inactive:
[LeaderLib_MissingModDependencyText_24356ba8-a1c7-4ad9-86fe-de1c834ec789]
Tip: Check your mod list at the main menu, and load a save from before you got this message after activating the missing mods.
When entering combat, party members within the set radius will automatically join that combat.
Preset changed. Have a wonderful day.
[GLOBAL] Prevent LeaderLib registered mod books from being automatically be added to the party's inventory. (Books are currently enabled)

One or more players are missing the script extender.
The script extender is needed for mods to work correctly.
Players missing the extender:
[1]

Apply On Hit:
[1] for [2] turns(s). ([3] Chance)
*The old man runs his hands over his clothes, trying to iron out the wrinkles.* What can I do for you, stranger?
If "Pull Party Into Combat" is enabled, this is the minimum range party members must be from that combat to automatically join. Default: 30m range.
*The old man runs his hands over his clothes, trying to iron out the wrinkles.* What can I do for you, stranger?
Dialog redirection will be restricted to characters you own as a user. For instance, if disabled, and another player in multiplayer has the highest persuasion, they may get dialog redirected to them.
*He hands you copy of the requested sacred text.*

ERROR
You are missing the Script Extender, and the host has mods that require it!
Please exit the game and install the Script Extender.
The game will not work correctly, mods will not work correctly, and Kalavinka will weep bloody tears of pain and regret.
Dialog will be redirected to the character with the highest persuasion value, instead of only avatar characters.

[1] allows you to backstab enemies with weapons other than a dagger.
(LeaderLib)
*The old man yawns, barely giving an indication to your presence.*
[USER] Teleport your avatar to the dialog event when dialog gets redirected.
[SAVE] Save Game Settings - This file is automatically loaded/saved when you get in-game (loading saves, new games, etc). This will overwrite whatever changes you may have recently made.
[GLOBAL] Disable Friendly Fire. This setting is for mods that implement friendly fire in their skill targeting conditions. (Currently Enabled)
Speaking of old junk, I have a few extra copies of this book I bet you'd like. It's on the house.
Welcome [LeaderLib_PlayerName_6c5b9559-53e3-47f7-8881-309a930e4be3]. Seems we're nearing the end of our journey together.
Certain mod books will be automatically added to your inventory initially, if enabled.
Insight on how to manage multiple summons at the same time. For summoners, by summoners. Read this book to learn this skill.
Remove Chain/Unchain Skills (User - All Owned Characters)

The amount of action points gained when a character's turn starts.
(Default: 4)
This option is disabled if the value equals -1.
Reset all global LeaderLib settings. EXPERIMENTAL!
I'm also selling some old belongings.

If enabled, Novice/Adept/Master tiered skills will be set to Starter instead, allowing them show up in character creation.
Note that if you don't have the required ability levels for memorization, the skill won't show up (enable Lower Skill Memorization Requirements to avoid that).
(Default: Disabled)
<font color='#FF0000'>LeaderLib Failed to Save Global Settings</font>
Hey there, [LeaderLib_PlayerName_6c5b9559-53e3-47f7-8881-309a930e4be3]! You made it off that wreck in one piece, eh? *He snorts.*
[GLOBAL] Disable automatically unlocking every inventory in multiplayer. (Currently Enabled)
[GLOBAL] Automatically pull party members within 30m into combat. (Currently Disabled)
*Ask what his plans are for his time on Reaper's Eye.*
[GLOBAL] Disable making the party member with the highest persuasion the redirection target, using the closest Avatar instead. (Default)
One second while I set things up...
*Introduce yourself, then ask the man who he is.*

If enabled, skills will be able to backstab depending on settings (melee only, minimum distance).
(Default: Disabled)
*He coughs out some sea water.* That she-beast of a sourceress nearly wiped me out with the others on the boat... *He trails off for a moment before returning his gaze back to you.*

[GLOBAL] Enable user ID matching when finding the closest character a party member belongs to. This will only allow the closest avatar (or persuasive) character a user controls (for the initial dialog character) to be selected when redirecting. (Currently Disabled)
Add Chain/Unchain Skills (User - All Owned Characters)

*He straightens his posture before speaking.* You may call me [LeaderLib_SpeakerName_9fc648d4-7984-44e7-afa4-b8a07f21185b]. Pleasure to meet you, [LeaderLib_PlayerName_6c5b9559-53e3-47f7-8881-309a930e4be3].
Enable various debug features with LeaderLib. Not recommended.
*With a puzzled look on your face, the old man speaks up before you get a chance to respond.*
[USER] Disable auto-opening the Mod Settings Menu when closing another mod's settings menu.

LeaderLib
* Error *
Required Mods Missing
Check your mod list at the main menu.

[USER] Enable auto-opening the Mod Settings Menu when closing another mod's settings menu.
Note that this could possibly have unintended side-effects if that mod opens a sub-menu dialog after the main menu dialog is closed.
Me? Oh, I'm just a retired old man, looking to sell his wares. *He rubs his beard, glancing around on the boat.* Afraid I'm not much of a soldier anymore, so trading is all I've got.
*Lothar grunts, rubbing his lower back as he chews on something.* Once I saw this beautiful ship in the distance, I knew it was my chance to escape. I swam like a fish.

A Story Compilation Error occurred with your active mods.
You may be missing mod requirements.
Mods will not work correctly.
To potentially fix this, please check the requirements of your active mods, such as required dependency mods, the script extender, and/or an updated game version.
*The old man looks to you as you approach.* Welcome! *He looks around.* Bit of a dreary place now, mm?

A peculiar tome said to be extremely convenient.
Read to access the "Mod Menu".

Enable AP settings for this group.
(Default: Disabled)
[GLOBAL] Disable the Unhealable fix - If Unhealable is applied, the target will still be able to be healed. (Currently Enabled)
[GLOBAL] Enable the Unhealable fix - If Unhealable is applied, the target will not be able to be healed by statuses (Regeneration, etc). (Currently Disabled)

If enabled, skill memorization requirements will be lowered (such as Necromancy 4 to Necromancy 1).
Ideally enable this alongside Skill Tier Overrides, so more skills can be selected in character creation.
(Default: Disabled)
*He snorts.* Why, fishing of course! *He gestures to the fishing rod on his back.*
*You notice the old man moves quickly, and seems to be prepared in the blink of an eye.*
*The old man perks up for a moment.*

[GLOBAL] Disable user ID matching when finding the closest character a party member belongs to. This will allow the closest avatar (or persuasive) character in multiplayer to control dialog when a non-avatar player triggers an automatic dialog event. (Current Enabled)
*He sets his fishing pole down for a moment and rummages through a bag,*
Speaking of, I have a few extra copies of this book I bet you'd like. It's on the house.
Enables friendly fire, which can allow skills or other mod mechanics to target allies.

Change to the opposite gender.
Warning: Replaces custom appearance settings!
Hey, [LeaderLib_PlayerName_6c5b9559-53e3-47f7-8881-309a930e4be3]! We made it off that dreadful island!
Character has taken a vow to avoid fighting, and will flee if pulled into combat.
I definitely activated these mods at one point! Why are they no longer active?
[HOST] Enable Balanced Experience for All Parties - Every player character will be brought up to the highest player level across all parties. (Currently Disabled)
You're already aware that I'm selling things, right? That's the plan here too, of course.
Give me a moment to prepare my things, and we can begin trading again.

If enabled, characters require the Backstab talent to be able to backstab with non-dagger equipment or skills.
(Default: Enabled)
[GLOBAL] Allow LeaderLib registered mod books to automatically be added to the party's inventory. (Books are currently disabled)

[LOAD] Load Game Settings - This file is loaded automatically when you get in-game (loading saves, new games, etc).
Location: Documents/Larian Studios/Divinity Original Sin 2 Definitive Edition/Osiris Data/LeaderLib_GameSettings.json
*You take a look at the trader's wares.*

The maximum amount of action points.
(Default: 6)
This option is disabled if the value equals -1.

Enable backstab settings for this group.
(Default: Disabled)
*Introduce yourself, then ask who you're talking to.*
*You take a look at his wares.*
As a gesture of goodwill towards future trading, I'll give you this book for free.
Enable redirecting automatically started dialog to characters that match your preferences, such as an avatar or character with the highest persuasion.
<font color='#80FFC3' size='18'>Automatically levels up with the wearer.</font>
I didn't survive war to end up dead by the likes of you!
Enable timed autosaving, using the interval and preferences set.
Chances are a mod was updated, which deactivates it by default. It's quite annoying, I know!

*He straightens his posture before speaking.* You may call me [LeaderLib_SpeakerName_9fc648d4-7984-44e7-afa4-b8a07f21185b]. Pleasure to meet you, [LeaderLib_PlayerName_6c5b9559-53e3-47f7-8881-309a930e4be3].
Give me a moment to prepare my things, and we can begin trading.
Fixes the Unhealable status to actually make it prevent healing. This is a status already in the game that mods may use.
*You notice the old man moves quickly, and seems to be prepared in the blink of an eye.*
[LUA] Reset LeaderLib Lua Scripts (*WARNING* For testing purposes only!)

The starting amount of action points when combat begins.
(Default: 4)
This option is disabled if the value equals -1.
*The old man looks to you as you approach.* Welcome, welcome!
Of course, of course. I have plenty to sell.
"Let me get my things in order here..." *He presumably situates a bag of goods that's strangely out of sight.*
*He spits out what is presumably seaweed.* So, what can I do for you today?
I managed to sneak away before that nasty Kraken showed up. *He groans and rubs his shoulders.* Damn if I won't feel it tomorrow, though...
Preset Menu (Locked - Check Back in 30 Seconds)
In multiplayer, your inventory will be unlocked automatically.

If enabled, only melee weapons or skills can backstab. Melee skills will use the Skill Minimum Distance setting.
(Default: Enabled)
*Introduce yourself, then ask the man who he is.*
Me? Oh, I'm just a retired old man, looking to get some fishing done. *He rubs his beard, glancing at the broken-down scenery.* Afraid I don't have any fight left in me anywho.
Chain all characters under your control that are within [1].
Oh! That reminds me. I have some goodies here. I'm selling them for fishing gear, you see. Part of my retirement plan.
[Steam] I subscribed to these mods, but they don't show up in the mod list!
Take control of a summon or follower you own.
Character is in an undead form.

[GLOBAL] Automatically unlock the party inventory in multiplayer. (Currently Disabled)
This will allow all players to exchange items between their inventories without having to unlock them first.
[GLOBAL] Enable Dialog Redirection. If dialog tries to start with a party member that is not an AVATAR (the crown symbol), the avatar that owns that character will be used instead.

Various settings that alter how the game works.
These settings can only be changed in singleplayer, or by the host in multiplayer.
Settings are saved to:
Documents/Larian Studios/Divinity Original Sin 2 Definitive Edition/Osiris Data/LeaderLib_GameSettings.json
Me? Oh, I'm just a retired old man, looking to sell his wares. *He rubs his beard, glancing around on the boat.* Afraid I'm not much of a soldier anymore, so trading is all I've got.

*He straightens his posture before speaking.* You may call me [LeaderLib_SpeakerName_9fc648d4-7984-44e7-afa4-b8a07f21185b]. Pleasure to meet you, [LeaderLib_PlayerName_6c5b9559-53e3-47f7-8881-309a930e4be3].
[GLOBAL] Automatically make the party member with the highest persuasion the redirection target. Still preserves User ID matching in multiplayer, if that setting is enabled.
*Request a copy of the "Mod Menu" book.*
*Ask why he's here on the Lady Vengeance.*

If skill backstabbing is enabled, this is the maximum distance allowed between the attacker and target (meaning they must be within this distance).
(Default: 2.5m)

This is likely an issue of the mod not copying to the right folder after subscribing.
Check the discussion pinned at LeaderLib's steam workshop page titled:
Support: Mod Doesn't Appear in the Mod List
